Working papers

Working Papers are published to invite comments and assist the Inquiry Group develop its thinking on key areas. They should not be considered as containing the Groupâs definitive views. For further information see the CCs Guidelines for Market Investigations (PDF, 675 Kb) , draft for public consultation, in particular paragraphs 56 and 57.
